about_the_game:
[MazeTD] is a tower defense game where the attack power of the arrow tower is slightly insufficient. You need to build a maze around the waypoints, allowing the animals to slowly navigate through the maze to give the arrow tower more attack time and eliminate them in the maze.

1. Click on the ground and create a stone.

2. Click on the stone and upgrade to one of the four types of arrow towers.

3. Click on the Arrow Tower and continue upgrading it.

4. WSAD mobile perspective, zoom in and out of the map with the mouse wheel.

The stone and arrow tower form a maze, and the animals have no attacking power. They will start from their birth point, reach waypoint 1, then waypoint 2,... reach waypoint N, and finally reach the endpoint.
